import React from 'react' import "./category_products.css" const Category_Products = ({id, title, features, specs,price}) => { const featureList = ()=>{ let FL = [] for(let i = 0; i{features[i]}) } return FL } return ( <>

{title}

Dimensions

{specs.dimensions}

Features

    {featureList()}

{price}

) } export default Category_Products
